Name: Malice in Magic Tower -玲鈴魔塔-
About the game: ■Highly strategic Puzzle RPG! The system of this game is similar to the popular game '魔塔'(Magic Tower) in China. Strengthen ATK (attack power), DEF (defense power), etc. Face strong enemies. There is no luck factor, and if you do the same move, you will get the same result. Let's enjoy it carefully with 3 ROUTEs with almost different contents. Ultra Resurrection system allows for multiple revivals, Beginners are also safe. ■Rescue Alice! To rescue Alice who was kidnapped by a mysterious woman who calls herself GODDES OF UNIVERSE Alice's older sister, Malice, stands up.
